title: PA Supreme Court Justice Michael Eakin apologizes for emails
text: HARRISBURG â€” A state Supreme Court justice apologized Wednesday for a batch of his private emails that Attorney General Kathleen Kane thought were inappropriate but others apparently did not when they reviewed them last year.
